languages.text: {n}...и внезапно в этом смерче агонии вам слышатся новые ноты — ноты торжества и упоения силой над поверженным противником. Глаза Маражая, внимательно следящего за вашим лицом, распахиваются шире, а его губы кривятся в победоносной улыбке.{/n}

{n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...и внезапно в этом смерче агонии вам слышатся новые ноты — ноты торжества и упоения силой над поверженным противником. Глаза Маражая, внимательно следящего за вашим лицом, распахиваются шире, а его губы кривятся в победоносной улыбке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}……突然之间，在这场痛苦的飓风之中，你体会到了新的感觉——那是胜利的呼唤与战胜敌人的快意。玛拉斋一直在紧紧地盯着你的脸，此刻，他瞪大了眼睛，嘴角勾起一抹得意的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……突然之间，在这场痛苦的飓风之中，你体会到了新的感觉——那是胜利的呼唤与战胜敌人的快意。玛拉斋一直在紧紧地盯着你的脸，此刻，他瞪大了眼睛，嘴角勾起一抹得意的微笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}…すると突然、この苦痛の旋風の中で、新たな感情の裏の一面―勝利の余韻と、倒した敵を思い通りにする高揚感に気づいた。こちらの顔をじっと見つめていたマラズハイは目を大きく見開き、その唇は嬉しそうな弧を描いていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…すると突然、この苦痛の旋風の中で、新たな感情の裏の一面―勝利の余韻と、倒した敵を思い通りにする高揚感に気づいた。こちらの顔をじっと見つめていたマラズハイは目を大きく見開き、その唇は嬉しそうな弧を描いていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... de pronto, en medio del remolino, distingues nuevos matices de sensaciones: destellos de triunfo y la emoción de dominar a un enemigo vencido. Los ojos de Marazhai, que te vigilan atentamente, se ensanchan y sus labios forman una sonrisa pletórica.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... de pronto, en medio del remolino, distingues nuevos matices de sensaciones: destellos de triunfo y la emoción de dominar a un enemigo vencido. Los ojos de Marazhai, que te vigilan atentamente, se ensanchan y sus labios forman una sonrisa pletórica.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Soudain, au beau milieu de ce tourbillon de souffrance, vous percevez des bribes d'émotions d'une tout autre nature : des relents de triomphe et l'ivresse consécutive à la défaite d'un adversaire. Les yeux de Marazhai, qui ne vous a pas {mf|lâché|lâchée} du regard, s'écarquillent et ses lèvres se courbent en un sourire d'exultation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, au beau milieu de ce tourbillon de souffrance, vous percevez des bribes d'émotions d'une tout autre nature : des relents de triomphe et l'ivresse consécutive à la défaite d'un adversaire. Les yeux de Marazhai, qui ne vous a pas {mf|lâché|lâchée} du regard, s'écarquillent et ses lèvres se courbent en un sourire d'exultation.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... und schlagartig werden dir in diesem Wirbelwind der Pein neue emotionale Schattierungen gewahr – ein Hauch von Triumph und der Rausch, von dem man ergriffen wird, wenn man einen besiegten Feind beherrscht. Marazhais Augen haben bisher ganz genau dein Gesicht studiert und weiten sich jetzt. Seine Lippen formen sich dabei zu einem frohlockenden Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... und schlagartig werden dir in diesem Wirbelwind der Pein neue emotionale Schattierungen gewahr – ein Hauch von Triumph und der Rausch, von dem man ergriffen wird, wenn man einen besiegten Feind beherrscht. Marazhais Augen haben bisher ganz genau dein Gesicht studiert und weiten sich jetzt. Seine Lippen formen sich dabei zu einem frohlockenden Lächeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bu ızdırap kasırgasının içinde aniden yeni duygu nüanslarının farkına varıyorsun. Yenilen bir düşman karşısındaki zaferin izlerini, üstünlüğün heyecanını hissediyorsun. Marazhai'ın yüzünü dikkatle izleyen gözleri açılıyor ve dudaklarında coşkulu bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and suddenly, in this whirlwind of agony, you discern new shades of feeling — hints of triumph and the thrill of mastery over a defeated foe. Marazhai's eyes, which have been watching your face closely, widen, and his lips curve into an exultant smile.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
